description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a remediation of contaminated soils at DND Work Point at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt west coast naval base.
full_summary:
# EZ113-240959 Work Point 3d Remediation Tender Notice

## Essential Details

* Tender Number: WS4296675622
* Publication Date: November 28, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Start Date: February 28, 2024

## Contract Specifications

* The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting bids for the remediation of contaminated soils at DND Work Point, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt west coast naval base.
* The contract falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The project category is Environmental Services, specifically polluted soil removal and treatment.
* The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with the end-user entity being DND.

## Procurement Process

* The procurement process is competitive and open to all qualified vendors.
* The selection criteria is based on the lowest price.
* Bids should be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform.

## Contact Information

* Clara Dumay, Procurement Specialist, PSPC
* Email: clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* No phone or fax number is available for contact.

## Documents and Resources

* The full tender notice, including scope of work and bid instructions, can be found on Ariba Discovery: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18133748?extsite=MTgxMzM3NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The rewritten entry has been formatted to be easier to read and understand, with clear headings and concise language. The essential details have been extracted and presented in a clear and organized manner. The contract specifications, procurement process, contact information, and documents and resources have been rewritten to be more professional and easy to understand.  Word Count: 266 words.
